column1: Villepinte is a commune in the northeastern suburbs of Paris
column2: France. It is located 18.3 km (11.4 mi)  from the center of Paris.  It is near the Charles de Gaulle Airport.  The Parc des Expositions de Villepinte is located in the city.  As of 2017
column3: the city had a population of 36

column1: Villepinte is served by three stations on Paris RER line B: Villepinte

column2: as well as 11 elementary schools.Secondary schools:

column1: Four junior high schools: Collège Françoise Dolto
Two senior high schools/sixth-form colleges: Lycée Jean Rostand and Lycée Georges Brassens
